original_text:
if the men of my tent have not said,
    ‘Who is there that has not been filled with his meat?’
korean_text: 내 장막 사람들은 주인의 고기에 배부르지 않은 자가 어디 있느뇨 하지 아니하였는가

sentences.original_text: if the men of my tent have not said,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 내 장막의 사람들이 말하지 않았다면,

sentences.original_text: that has not been filled with his meat?’
